snippet: The reputation of the Russian men’s team took another hit at the Chess Olympiad, where it did not medal, although the Russian women took the gold.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column observes that the reputation of the Russian national men's team has taken another hit after they failed to medal at the Chess Olympiad; notes that women's team took gold.
lead_paragraph: The reputation of the Russian men’s team took another hit at the Chess Olympiad, where it did not medal, although the Russian women took the gold.

headline.main: Flow of Olympiad Medals for Russian Men Dries Up
headline.print_headline: Flow of Olympiad Medals for Russian Men Dries Up
